description:
Employer Industry: Sports Development

Why Consider this Job Opportunity:
- Opportunity to be part of a groundbreaking movement in sports development
- Chance to contribute to a sports revolution with global impact
- Limitless creative and sales possibilities
- Work in a mixed-gender and safe contact sport environment
- Support charitable causes during the FIFA World Cup 2026

What to Expect (Job Responsibilities):
- Identify, prospect, and secure sponsorship opportunities for local sports tournaments in San Diego
- Develop and maintain relationships with local businesses, corporations, and community partners to maximize sponsorship revenue
- Create compelling sponsorship packages tailored to the needs of potential sponsors
- Collaborate with media outlets to sell advertising space and coverage for the tournaments
- Develop media partnerships to enhance the visibility of the tournaments and increase audience engagement

What is Required (Qualifications):
- Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, Communications, or a related field
- Proven experience in sponsorship and media sales, preferably in the sports or events industry
- Strong network of local business contacts and an ability to build and maintain relationships
- Excellent communication and negotiation skills
- Results-driven with a track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets

How to Stand Out (Preferred Qualifications):
- Familiarity with the San Diego market

Hashtags:
#SportsDevelopment #GroundbreakingMovement #GlobalImpact #CreativeOpportunities #CharitableCauses

At Talentify, we prioritize candidate privacy and champion equal-opportunity employment. Central to our mission is our partnership with companies that share this commitment. We aim to foster a fair, transparent, and secure hiring environment for all. If you encounter any employer not adhering to these principles, please bring it to our attention immediately.
Talentify is not the EOR (Employer of Record) for this position. Our role in this specific opportunity is to connect outstanding candidates with a top-tier employer.
